name: FeedbackController
summary: Makes it easy to integrate haptic feedback into your UIViewController ðŸ”¨
description:
This pod makes it easy to integrate haptic feedback into your app. It provides a class that wrapps the UIFeedbackGenerator API and provides a UIViewController extension. The mentioned class also performs availability cheking against the current iOS version as well as device capabilities for you.

It enables you to integrate haptic feedback in two lines of code.
